attributes.action: cyclists using roads have mandatory modifications and adaptations to their bikes
attributes.additional_details: I would like to see cyclists have a mandatory insurance, bike MOT, tax levy, mandatory safety gear and registration plates
attributes.background: So, I drive a Class 1 vehicle and see too many times cyclists going through red lights, not wearing safety gear. I hear too many tiles of cyclists being killed as a result of wagons, it’s time but to the onus on them and penalise them for bad riding or riding without due care.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for cyclists and bicycles used on the road to be tested, taxed, insured and registered. 

If you want the Government and Parliament to introduce a licencing system for cyclists and tighten up cycle law, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/222565
